getpedr 0.0.1
  • Home
  • Reference
  • News
  • github
`getpedr` provides an interface to access public economic data, which are provided by national statistics, central bank, stock exchange etc. Three kinds of datasets are included in `getpedr`, market data (`getmd*`), financial reports (`getfr`), and economic data (`geted*`).
